name: Fadeaway Reboot
description:
4-player co-op zombie survival game where you try to rack up the kills, and see who the last player standing is. The catch? You can't see in the night... except for when lightning strikes!

This game is the multiplayer reboot of the original game Fadeway which Sunny Nagam made for a Cobresun Gamejam in 2017.

The background music is: Hitman by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3880-hitman/

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

The title screen music is: Epic Unease by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3714-epic-unease

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
